details:
Wireshark is a network "sniffer" - a tool that captures and analyzes
 packets off the wire. Wireshark can decode too many protocols to list
 here.

 This package provides the GTK+ version of wireshark.
 protocol::ethernet, role::program, scope::utility,
 secteam::lenny-limited-support, secteam::squeeze-limited-support,
 uitoolkit::gtk, use::analysing, use::monitor,
 works-with::network-traffic, x11::application
